description: Lady Une is Treize`s loyal aide and agent, whom he often assigns to assassinate enemies or command important field operations. While she is passionately devoted to Treize, Lady Une shows no mercy to her master`s foes, and is infamous for her overzealous cruelty. One day she`s demurely running water for Treize`s bath, the next she`s bombing diplomats or threatening to attack unarmed space colonies. You`d almost think she had some kind of split personality..
name: Lady Une
